title: Secondary Food Service Manager
status: Full Time, 40 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:Valid Food Handler’s Permit/License.  Valid Utah Driver’s License.The incumbent must obtain a valid ServSafe permit/license within 6 months of being hired.The incumbent will certify with the School Nutrition Association with Level 2 or 3 within 2 years of being hired.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 4 of the FD Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkFD Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Food Service Manager, Secondary.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
